Reference

All functions

armadillo.copy_workspace()

Copy workspace

armadillo.create_folder()

Create a folder for a variable collection

armadillo.create_workspace()

Combines tables in an .Rdata file and uploads them to a folder.

armadillo.delete_folder()

Delete folder

armadillo.delete_user_folder()

Deletes a user's folder from the Users bucket

armadillo.delete_workspace()

Delete workspace

armadillo.list_folders()

List the shared folders

armadillo.list_user_folders()

List the user folders

armadillo.list_workspaces()

List the workspaces

armadillo.load_workspace()

Load workspace based upon study folder and tableset

armadillo.login()

Login

armadillo.move_workspace()

Move the workspace
